My research focuses on computer security, with an emphasis on security metrics and human factors. I'm interested in understanding the relationship between real-world threats and user security behaviors/preferences, and building systems to provide usable defenses.
Experience: My research focuses on computer security, with an emphasis on the human factors affecting security workers. President of university.  Led the institution through the creation of the first American-accredited undergraduate program in the former Soviet Union.
